entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brampton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:55 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.4°C

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
